Job Title: Sales/Use Tax Senior - $120k + Bonus

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Henderson Harbor Tax was established in 2009 as a specialized tax placement division of Henderson Harbor Group. Over the past 14 years, HHTax has successfully leveraged our vast network of tax professionals and our targeted industry knowledge to successfully advise careers and place professionals at every level from Tax Associates to Chief Tax Officers, and Tax Partners, in both private industry and public accounting. We service our clients primarily in the New York Metro area, as well as nationally through our AAFA network (45 financial staffing affiliates throughout the U.S. and Canada).
Our advisory services client is seeking a Sales & Use Tax Senior to play a vital role in the tax audit, compliance and planning processes. This position will be responsible for managing and optimizing indirect tax compliance, planning and risk management. This right candidate will have a strong understanding of indirect tax laws, regulations and their implications on business operations.
Job Title: Tax Senior - 8010
Compensation: up to $120k + Bonus
Responsibilities:
Prepare/review Sales & Use tax returns in majority of statesAssist with and prepare documentation for tax audits for US, Puerto Rico and Canada.Maintain appropriate documentation for audit purposesDocument and maintain tax-related proceduresPrepare monthly and annual tax reportingPrepare estimated quarterly paymentsMaintain general ledger and reconcile accounts
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in accountingCPA/MST certification preferredMinimum of 3 years of experience in tax compliance and controversy in indirect taxStrong indirect tax software experience
About our Process: We will notify you if you are selected as a candidate for this role. If not, but you fit our specializations, we'll consider you for future openings, and encourage you to apply for other Henderson Harbor roles you're qualified for/interested in. Candidates for all Henderson Harbor opportunities must be authorized to work in the United States. Henderson Harbor is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
